user.biography: World pioneer of diamond perfection. Blending 130 years of expertise with modern creativity in works of art that bring nature’s wonders to life.

node.text:
Join our CEO @celine_assimon in conversation with @katerina_perez as they take a deep dive into the world of De Beers High Jewellery, including The 1888 Master Diamonds and our Reflections of Nature collection. Want the in-person experience? Visit our store in @harrods, where these are on display - for a limited time only.

#debeers #highjewellery

node.title: De Beers in conversation with Katerina Perez

node.text:
Nearly all of the diamonds we discover are shades of white, but once in every 10,000 or so, a fancy colour diamond is discovered – its incredible character matched only by its rarity. 
Join President of the De Beers Institute of Diamonds, Andrew Coxon and Fashion Director & Publisher @carolineissa on IGTV to learn all about fancy colour diamonds. 

#debeers #coloureddiamonds #fancycolours #diamonds

node.text:
Buying a De Beers diamond is the beginning of a special journey - one that can last a lifetime. 

Watch our latest Fundamentals episode on IGTV for brilliant tips on how to look after your diamond.

#debeers #diamonds

node.text:
From round-edged to straight-edged diamonds, at De Beers there is a shape to match your style. 💎

Find the one for you with President of the De Beers Institute of Diamonds, Andrew Coxon and Fashion Director & Publisher @carolineissa 

#debeers #diamondshapes #engagementring

node.text:
As leaders in ethics and sustainability practices, we strive to create a positive impact that will endure well beyond the discovery of our last diamond.

This #EarthDay, join us to learn more about our commitment.

#debeers #buildingforever

node.text:
Cut, colour, clarity and carat determine a diamond’s rarity and value.

However, the famous 4Cs are silent on the subject of beauty – the most important part of our diamond selection work at De Beers. 

Join President of the De Beers Institute of Diamonds, Andrew Coxon and Fashion Director & Publisher @carolineissa on IGTV to discover more about the Famous Four.

#debeers #diamonds #the4Cs

node.text:
The secret to finding your perfect diamond?
Try on as many options as possible and, ultimately, trust your heart. 

Discover our top tips with President of the De Beers Institute of Diamonds, Andrew Coxon and Fashion Director & Publisher @carolineissa 💎

#debeers #diamonds

node.text:
Have you ever held ‘forever’ in your hands?

Older than some of the stars in the sky, diamonds are powerful symbols of beauty that transcends time, owing their uniqueness to an extraordinary journey.

Join President of the De Beers Institute of Diamonds, Andrew Coxon and Fashion Director & Publisher @carolineissa to dive into the fascinating world of natural diamonds.

#debeers #diamonds  #naturestalisman

node.text:
Ever since they were first discovered, diamonds have captivated mankind. 

Embark on a journey of discovery with President of the De Beers Institute of Diamonds, Andrew Coxon and Fashion Director & Publisher @carolineissa on our IGTV 💎 

#debeers #diamonds #historyofdiamonds

node.text: The horizon line. An expression of limitless light and infinite possibilities, now defining our newest creation, the Horizon ring. #debeerslondon #thehomeofdiamonds #onmyhorizon

node.text:
This QiXi, fall in love with our Enchanted Lotus collection. Tap to shop and find the perfect gift for the special someone you will treasure forever.

#debeers #diamondgifts #qixi

node.text:
We are proud to support @Worldelephantday on their 10th anniversary, as part of our ongoing commitment to protecting the natural world. 
Tap the link in bio for a chance to see the elephant population we protect at one of our Diamond Route nature reserve

#debeers #buildingforever #worldelephantday
